title: cultural_data_Chertsey_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.surfaceimpression.chertsey.
Application Name: Chertsey Museum.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: Chertsey Museum, the museum for Runnymede Borough, presents a new smart phone app that will bring the past and present together in the streets and lanes of this Surrey, UK, town. Chertsey is found on the banks of the river Thames, South West of London.A Window on the PastThe app brings to life the Museum’s collection of historic photographs of the town's shops and streetscapes. Using GPS and an interactive map,it creates a window on the past from the exact position in which you are standing. Coinciding with the Museum's current exhibition “Shops and Shopping,” the images cover the period from 1880 to 1980. Over time the Museum will add further photos to the mobile exhibition. Find out the history of the traditional, quirky or long-forgotten shops of Chertsey; explore the fascinating photos; and follow a trail through this pretty market town.This app was funded by the Heritage Lottery Fund's 'All Our Stories' grant stream.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 952.00.
Overall Rate: 0.00.
First Page Reviews: Class I <3 Chertsey Museum, fantastic place for a first date and maybe a second LOL ;) Wagon & Horses Home to my great grandfather in the late 1800's Really improves a walk around the town Lots of interesting facts, easy to access using the map which shows your location and buildings featured near you. However there are some problems with my Samsung Galaxy 3 mini.  The program sometimes crashes when opened.  Also the interactive map doesn't always work, sometimes it doesn't show the p...Full ReviewLots of interesting facts, easy to access using the map which shows your location and buildings featured near you. However there are some problems with my Samsung Galaxy 3 mini.  The program sometimes crashes when opened.  Also the interactive map doesn't always work, sometimes it doesn't show the places featured on the app. If you're visiting Chertsey and want to understand the town, this is great!.
